title: New Kanye Fans, Senate Slippin? 10.30.19
itunes:title: New Kanye Fans, Senate Slippin? 10.30.19
description:
In episode 505, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Facial Recognition Comedy co-host Fizaa Dosani to discuss the GOP's nightmare scenario, Katie Hill's unjust resignation, California wildfires, all the wrong people loving Kanye's new album, horrible and insensitive Halloween decorations, and more! Plus Buzzfeed's Impeachment Today host Hayes Brown joins the crew to talk the day's impeachment news!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Impeachment Today Podcast: The White House Has A Problem, And His Name Is Alexander Vindman
  2. The GOP's nightmare scenario
  3. Senate challengers outraise incumbents
  4. Brian Kilmeade on Army Lt. Col. Vindman: "We also know he was born in the Soviet Union, emigrated with his family. Young. He tends to feel simpatico with the Ukraine."
  5. Army Officer Who Heard Trump’s Ukraine Call Reported Concerns
  6. Sean Duffy on CNN on Army Lt. Col. Vindman: "It seems very clear that he is incredibly concerned about Ukrainian defense. I don't know that he's concerned about American policy ... we all have an affinity to our homeland where we came from ... he has an affinity for the Ukraine."
  7. Duncan Hunter Boned Lobbyists, Staffers, For AMERICA
  8. Katie Hill's Resignation Is an Ugly Mess
  9. MAP: How big are the California fires? See size, shape of dozens of blazes
  10. Could mass blackouts, Kincade Fire end PG&E as we know it?
  11. All the Wrong People Love Jesus Is King 
  12. Crime scene Halloween display at district attorney's office blasted as 'insensitive'
  13. Backlash continues against Brooklyn Halloween display
  14. Local McDonald’s apologizes for inappropriate Halloween decorations
  15. Halloween displays featuring lynchings have unnerved neighbors throughout the Austin area
  16. Homeowners Hang Mannequin and Confederate Flag in Front Yard, Claim It's a Leftover Halloween Decoration
  17. WATCH: Oscar Jerome - Do You Really

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
